nodes.text: Jigoba was a crime lord who operated in the Corporate Sector during the New Order, and controlled an organization similar in size to that of Talon Karrde. While in the employ of Jigoba's organization outside of the Corporate Sector, Ploovo Two-For-One was educated in the finer points of usury. Ploovo made off with whatever he could of Jigoba's possessions and fled to the Corporate Sector when Jabba the Hutt moved in on Jigoba's turf after Jigoba died.
